abstract: The company said it would remove advertising from pages with content that might be offensive or controversial.
snippet: The company said it would remove advertising from pages with content that might be offensive or controversial.
lead_paragraph: Facebook said on Friday that it would remove ads from pages that contain controversial content, as it tries to protect advertisers from appearing next to offensive material beyond their control.

headline.main: Facebook to Shield Ads From Offensive Content
headline.print_headline: Facebook to Withdraw Ads From Offensive Pages
